org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.user

Interface NeighborhoodFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleNeighborhoodFinder

    @DefaultImplementation(value=SimpleNeighborhoodFinder.class)
public interface NeighborhoodFinder
    Interface for neighborhood-finding strategies. These strategies are used by UserUserItemScorer to find neighbors for generating scores.
    Author:
    GroupLens Research

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.Long2ObjectMap<? extends Collection<Neighbor>> findNeighbors(UserHistory<? extends Event> user, it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongSet items)
      Find neighboring users for particular items.

    • Method Detail

      • findNeighbors

        it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.Long2ObjectMap<? extends Collection<Neighbor>> findNeighbors(@Nonnull
                                                                                       UserHistory<? extends Event> user,
                                                                                       @Nonnull
                                                                                       it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongSet items)
        Find neighboring users for particular items. and the returned rating vectors are unnormalized. Any normalization used by the neighborhood finder is only for comparing neighbors.
        Parameters:
        user - The user's event history.
        items - The items we're trying to recommend, or null to get get neighborhoods for all possible items.
        Returns:
        A map from item IDs to user neighborhoods for all items for which we can find neighboring users.
